MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH64 and CH66 postcode area of Ellesmere Port and Neston, affecting properties in Chester High Road, Haddon Lane, Puddington Lane and surrounding areas and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line, and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.12PM on 13th February 2021
